short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and easy to use todo list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your time efficiently by using our simple todo list manager.  Create a list of the tasks you have to complete in order to achieve a more productive workflow.  Simply check off tasks as you complete them to keep track of your progress through the day.

This apps simplicity makes it easy to add new tasks to your list in one click.  Never forget the things that are important by using this todo app.
